gov.ornl.keva.node

Class WriteBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.keva.node.WriteBatch

  • public class WriteBatch
extends java.lang.Object
    Batch operations list write operations that must be applied atomically. The writes are applied in order for a single key, but are not ordered across different keys.
    Author:
    James Horey
